A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: What a soul crushing disappointment. I honestly felt like I had been robbed of my entrance fee. Such high expectations such absolute rubbish. Since Disney took over they were way to eager to push the new generation Rey / Kylo etc - I mean Han\, Leia and Luke never meet up once in these movies (and never will again now) - the so called humour was cringe worthy; the Leia floating in space moment was groan inducing rubbish; plot holes everywhere - honestly the worst Star Wars film ever - as a long time fan I wont be going to anymore Disney Star Wars films. Whoever\, green lit this rubbish script should be sacked.
